title: Netflix Open Sources Maestro, a Next-Gen Data Workflow Engine
author: Joab Jackson
description: Maestro provides a Workflow as a Service to Netflix's data scientists and information-hungry line-of-business managers.
cntitle: Netflix 开源 Maestro，下一代数据工作流引擎
cndescription: Maestro 为 Netflix 的数据科学家和信息需求旺盛的业务线经理提供工作流即服务。
